name: SHARES FUTURES FOUNDATION
goal: Shares Futures Fondations is an International Not -For-Profit Organisation organised under Belgian law.Shares Futures Foundation is set up and represent common interest serving EU public contracting authorities and economic operators and EU interest all over the world.Project and contract management,monotoring and evaluation of EU legislation severals sectors.Trade and business.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Anti corruption, humanitarian ,project and contract management,monotoring and evaluation of EU legislation severals sectors, implementing on renewable energy, protection children ,promote  development and socio economic and cultural on EU sector.
